description:
This bucket style hat with seam sealed Schoeller waterproof and windproof fabric will be a go to for any wild adventure. With it crown and chin cords at your disposal, it won’t be going anywhere without you knowing it.

  • Schoeller® fabric is breathable and lets out excess heat
  • UPF 50+ will keep harmful rays at bay
  • Sloped brim keeps water off your face
  • Adjustable chin and crown cords to cinch it down
name: Tilley Storm Bucket - Unisex
